mangaName: The Executed Sage Is Reincarnated as a Lich and Starts an All-Out War
alternativeNames:
Shokei Sareta Kenja wa Lich ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku Sensou wo Hajimaru
Казненный мудрец переродился в некроманта и начал тотальную войну
الساحر العائد للإنتقام من العالم~الساحر الذي تم إعدامه أعيد إحيائه كليتش وبدأ حرب ضد الجميع
จอมปราชญ์ผู้มีกายาเป็นลิช
ปราชญ์เกิดใหม่เป็นลิช
処刑された賢者はリッチに転生して侵略戦争を始める
처형당한 현자는 리치로 전생하여 침략 전쟁을 시작한다
author: Yuuki Karaku
description: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness.However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die .......But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons going to start an all out war ...!Web Novel (Raw)
